website_summaries.verdict: Top-quality, 100% organic cotton burp cloths that come in a pack of 5.
pros: Trifold design protects shoulder from messes
Stays soft after excessive use and washings
cons: These only come in one style/color option that is a unisex grey

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not practical
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and soft but they aren’t very absorbent. I’ve been using them awhile now and they are now notorious for being the spit rags that milk literally rolls right off of onto the floor. They are very soft and cute prints which is nice when I dab baby’s mouth, but they really just don’t get the job done. I ended up having to purchase some Aden and anais burp rags because I had a couple from my first baby and know they are large and super absorbent. I really wouldn’t recommend these Burt’s Bees ones unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Rada Trimble

customer_reviews.title: Best burp cloths
customer_reviews.text: I thought that burp cloths were a dumb purchase; I figured we would just use dish towels. It turns out that I am the dumb one. YES, you have to buy burp cloths, and you should buy these ones. They are way softer and way more absorbent than other towels. These ones are great because the pleating makes it easy to make them wider/narrower, and the fabric is very absorbent, but also they stay on your shoulder. Very important! My only complaint is the same one I have of all burp cloths: why is there a tag? It just gets in your way; I’ve cut all of mine off.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: These are good for a couple of over-the-shoulder burping sessions
customer_reviews.text: These are good for a couple of over-the-shoulder burping sessions. I also place it on the mattress below where the baby's head goes in case she has any spit-up when first placing her down. My only complaint: At new & after many washes, much of the spit-up stays on top of the cloth instead of absorbing more into the cloth, so baby can dip their face back into the spit-up and cover themselves with it :( Note, these are almost identical to the cheaper "Unisex-baby Newborn Gerber 3 Pack Knit Burpcloths" (I have both, can't really tell a difference between them).
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kaufmann

customer_reviews.title: Very soft, but they absorb nothing
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these, but all they do is push the liquid around my babies face. Great if my goal is to see how far I can stretch a small amount of spit up over a surface, but for wiping and cleaning they turned out to be an expensive organic waste of money. Basic cloth diapers do a far better job for less money.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie M

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended, love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought a lot of things for my coming baby, this is one of the best purchases I’ve ever made in these two months! I even love organic cotton material because of it! No smell at all. Super soft and safe material for my baby, can’t wait to try.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Z.

customer_reviews.title: When I pick up the cloth after using it I can't tell which parts of it are clean or dirty.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: soft Cons: not absorbant so the spit up or drool just sits on top of the cloth. This shade of grey does not darken (and bc it's not absorbing) so you can't see where the already wet spots are. When I pick up the cloth after using it I can't tell which parts of it are clean or dirty.
customer_reviews.author: SLB

customer_reviews.title: Sweet, soft and perfectly functional
customer_reviews.text: Love Burt’s Bees baby line and these burp cloths are no exception. Cute, soft, organic, and very giftable. That said, there are cheaper, bigger and more absorbent burp cloths out there if you’re a practical sort of shopper. But these do the job with a little extra sweetness (and do have a great second life as scratch free, reusable cleaning cloths when baby is done with them!)
customer_reviews.author: AQuinnT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent burp cloths
customer_reviews.text: Excellent burp cloths. Soft, absorbent and doesn't hold the smell of a traditional "cloth diaper" when washed. My baby loves to cuddle up to them and gnaw on them. Permanent baby shower gift (along with the nose frida)
customer_reviews.author: JCandMSC15

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Burp Cloths
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing but had to take off 1 star b/c they are so expensive. You can get a pack of white muslin burp cloths for around $8 or so which are super nice, absorbent and roughly the same size. For a gift item this is amazing and so cute! But real talk you're gonna need these around everywhere and you'll really go through them. At $25 for a set I'd have to spend a good $100 just to have decent stock around here for my little one. I wish I could get more and maybe at some point I'll treat myself. They are very high quality and absorbent. I love this item, just wish it cost less.
customer_reviews.author: Kay K

customer_reviews.title: amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved these burp cloths and I'm very happy with this purchase. I bought them for my second newborn baby, so I've had my share of burp clothes around the house. These are by far the softest and prettier ones. I haven't used them yet, I've only washed them by hand before the first use. The keep shape and material softness and quality, and seem ideal to use with baby's delicate skin. Good size too...not extremely big but small enough to cover your entire shoulder or fore arm while carrying or burping the baby. Would definetly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: We had these in gray and I bought 5 more because they’re wonderful! We had other burp clothes that just aren’t as soft or absorbent and are 2-ply and we prefer the single ply that burts offers. These are super cute and a great size. So excited to have 5 more around for the spit ups!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs a lot and very soft
customer_reviews.text: These are really great burp cloths. They are very soft, absorb a lot, and come in cute and pretty patterns. The quality of these is really great as well. I bought a second set so I would have extra to put in the diaper bag and also to not have to do laundry as often. These burp cloths were able to handle a couple of vomiting incidents, so I'd say the absorbency is pretty darn good. I definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Organic, pretty blue.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter had these on her registry and they were out of them so went online and found them in sky blue. She mentioned them to me prior because she liked the fact they were organic. She is a business woman and runs her business out of her home so there will be times we she may have work clothes on as daddy so this will be good for them and because they are organic will be good for baby to lay his face or head. Seem soft. I think she will like them.
customer_reviews.author: eileen gross

customer_reviews.title: My favorite burp cloths
customer_reviews.text: My favorite burp cloths. Simple design, soft, and thin enough to get under her chin and into her neck rolls easily. I've tried using cloth diapers as burp cloths but I find them to be too thick to really be functional. These are absorbent enough for a mild to moderate spitter upper and they wash and dry easily. I now give them as gifts to expectant moms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: Use these daily with my newborn. Soft, absorbent, never had spit up get through to my shirt. I often fold it up and keep using them when I can’t replace it right away. Also use on changing table to put over little boy when changing his diaper. I bought two more packs so I can keep clean ones everywhere and do less laundry. I had bought some cute themed ones and have barely used them ( rough, awkward size), these are much more practical. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Larson

customer_reviews.title: Best Burp Cloths hands down
customer_reviews.text: these are the best burp cloths under the sun. They are super soft on my daughters newborn skin and the spit up has never gone through. We have tried other brand burp clothes and they are half the price but very scratchy or less absorbent. I will keep paying this price for a quality product that we love. Thanks Burts Bees!
customer_reviews.author: WORCESTER

customer_reviews.title: Burts bees never disappoints
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a baby shower to use on a onesie and burpee decorating station. They are super soft and absorbent. I’ve been a fan of burts bees for years, and these are yet another reason why. I only washed them once before I gave them away so I can’t say for sure, but I suspect that they are durable as other baby/toddler clothing I am familiar with.
customer_reviews.author: Redhead

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but not functional.  Does not absorb any liquids.
customer_reviews.text: These things are gorgeous -- they're visually appealing, soft, and a great size. But they have one fatal flaw: they are not absorbent. At all. They are a total functional fail. They just push the puke around and don't absorb it. I threw all of these away and bought some Muslin burp cloths instead. This product is what I replaced them with and they're not as cute, but a thousand times more functional:
customer_reviews.author: Tesla Model 3 Accessories

customer_reviews.title: Not really practical burp rags, better off with a hand towel!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these, they are super soft and look great but they are not really good for their intended purpose. First off as other reviewers noted, they are very stylish and super soft, but they don't really absorb any formula that dribbles off the baby. I resorted to using them as place mats for the changing station. If you want really good burp bibs and cloths you are better off spending your money with Aden + Anais they are simply the best.
customer_reviews.author: Infantible

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Soft and absorbent. Although don't make the same mistake as me, remove the corner sticker that is on 2 of the cloths! I washed them with them on and now they won't come off! I'm very happy with these, I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: em

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market. Love love them
customer_reviews.text: Softest burp rags out there. Love. Would buy sweatshirts in this material. So cozy soft for wiping babies skin and still thick and absorbent. Plus they flop over your shoulder great not awkward like others
customer_reviews.author: Ekornh

customer_reviews.title: 100% Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: You know how iffy things can be when they say they're "extra absorbent", well these cloths seriously are ridiculously absorbent. We have a baby who has issues keeping all her milk down and these things will last all day long. They're also super freakin' soft too, which is nice for babies wittle face. Probably going to order another set because laundry sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Luke W

customer_reviews.title: Must for any expectant parent!
customer_reviews.text: I love these burp clothes! I wasn’t so sure what to register for when I was pregnant since I was a first time mom, but my cousin recommended these and I loved them. They’re light enough that you can carry them around without being cumbersome but durable enough to clean up after a colicky baby. They were very soft (the ones with patterns more so than the solid color for some reason) and the pattern was very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Soft, durable, perfect for newborns or babies with sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these burp rags! So soft, great quality and we use them often. After washing a few times they have remained great quality, still soft and durable. I would suggest this to someone with newborns or babies with sensitive skin as they are gentle and soft. Would repurchase or gift! Love Burt’s Bee’s baby products!
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Declercq

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for the perfect baby gift or burp cloths for your own baby, these are the ones to get! I received these as a gift and immediately bought more online. They are softer than any of the burp cloths that I had with my first child and are the perfect size. These are my new go to for baby gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Eakunk

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft, perfect for a drooling baby
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice, not quite absorbent as the muslin ones, but good quality and soft. I like them and I like the muslin ones. I use them both for different things, like my son drools sooooooo much, so I’d rather hold one of these under his chin because it will last longer then the muslin, but the muslin will catch a bunch of spit up better.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha M Woolley

customer_reviews.title: nice soft burp pads
customer_reviews.text: initially, i thought to myself i needed to find some good old fashioned cloth diapers as these weren't going to be enough of a burp pad...but surprise, surprise...even with a relatively big regurg, they were large enough and soft enough for the newest baby's skin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best burp cloths
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft and thick these burp cloths are. Or baby is a huge spitter and we were disappointed with how thin some of the other brand burp cloths were. These are perfect but they are a little pricey. I would love to have more but probably won’t buy any because of price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: These are the best burp cloths we’ve come across. Yes, I understand it’s $25 for five cloths that you’re going to wipe your babies face with but it is totally worth it! They don’t irritate my son’s face when I need to wipe his mouth. We have others that leave his face red and irritating. These are super soft and come in adorable prints. Definitely worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: VelociMeagan

customer_reviews.title: I Ended Up Buying a 2nd Set
customer_reviews.text: Okay -- they are not the MOST absorbent, but neither are my other burp clothes (Gerber and Synrroe). What they ARE is soft, GOTS certified, and a good size. Also, unlike the other two, they didn't shrink in the dryer and become 1/2 their size (I only ever use the low setting, so I'm still not even sure how that happened with the other two.) I bought one set and then bought a second set after I did the wash and these came out the same as when I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, thin. Cut up an undershirt, it would be better. Washed about 10 times, strings appeared. 2 stars because they are soft and absorb. Just wish I didnt over pay for skimpy rags.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstenin

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Burp Cloths
customer_reviews.text: These things are very soft and a great size- we tend to tuck them into our daughter's onesie collar while she eats from a bottle because she's a little messy and they are more versatile than using a bib thing. They also transition nicely from keeping her shirt clean to keeping mine clean when I burp her. Worth the price, I think.
customer_reviews.author: Rich E.

customer_reviews.title: soft but thin
customer_reviews.text: these are quite smaller than i expected and much thinner than other burp clothes I've purchased, but they are soft and work for what they are needed for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and doesn’t appear to stain
customer_reviews.text: These are really soft and softer after each wash. Love the different colors. I wish they were slightly larger. Another improvement is the tag. I haven’t cut them yet, but I plan too. The tag is to much by baby’s face- you have to always be sure you are aware to turn them around.
customer_reviews.author: Netti51

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite
customer_reviews.text: Excellent burp cloths. Way more important to me than expected — many of the ones we were given as gifts have fallen apart in the wash over time. These have held up good as new! Perhaps even softer over time! We have bought countless more. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: ReviewedByMom

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Look no further these burp rags are the best! I love these Burt’s bees burp rags! They are organic, soft, absorbent, and work great! I use these every day whether I am cleaning up my sons spit up or just soaking up his slobber these rags work so well!
customer_reviews.author: AmberS

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them!
customer_reviews.text: Just yes! These are my favorite burp clothes ever! They lasted so well I’m using a set from my second child with my third 3 years later! I even bought a few more sets this time around. The best you’ll find anywhere and so worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Alberts

customer_reviews.title: Thin poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I was so surprised by the quality with the amount of positive reviews this has. This is nothing more than a thin piece of fabric that isn't even soft. It is also very small. I bought larger one that's are thicker, softer and more absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: shoptilldropamazon

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be soft, well made!
customer_reviews.text: We just got these and although the baby hasn't arrived yet so we haven't put them to the test, they seem soft and pretty well made. A little on the small side, but I love the seaglass green color (mint) for a pretty but neutral option!
customer_reviews.author: Kate24

customer_reviews.title: Love these cloths
customer_reviews.text: I recieved a set as a baby shower gift and have loved them so I got more lol. They are a bit small so I pair them with a larger burp cloth as a mouth wiper while the large one catches the throw up or mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not large enough
customer_reviews.text: I loved these clothes when I initially bought them but they're a bit too short. They're not quite long enough to catch all the spit up over your shoulder. Also, a friend recommended laying a burp cloth down underneath baby girl's head and wrapping it around the Snoo mattress pad to secure it down. That way, when she spits up, I dont have to change out the mattress cover. Good idea, but these are not long enough. Nor are they long enough to help restrain babies arms in the Snoo sack as Happiest Baby recommends.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis L Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Who knows?
customer_reviews.text: Sent these as a gift through baby.com. Got a generic thank you note without mention of the gift that was received and no mention of their quality. So, I have to assume they were either fine or awful.
customer_reviews.author: amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these burp cloths. They’re so soft, absorbent and the perfect size. I got these for my third baby & I’ve had crummy, thin, scratchy burp cloths in the past. These far surpass those and I have literally said how much I wish I had these for those babies also. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Soft But Wish It Was More Absorbent
customer_reviews.text: They’re cute, soft and usually start off as blankets in the car seat when we leave the house. However, I have burp clothes that are a lot cheaper and a lot more absorbent. I do fall back on these when my baby has a rashy face because I know the fabric won’t irritate it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat S.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and soft but I found them to be way too small. They are way smaller then they look in the picture, and I found they were far less absorbent then other burp clothes I tried. Would not by It again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite burp cloths! My daughter has acid reflux so we ALWAYS have a burp cloth on hand and after trying several burp cloths that weren’t soft or absorbent I got these. I love them! Super nice quality and they don’t feel soaking wet after one use. They’re pricey for a burp cloth, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Kearns

customer_reviews.title: The BEST birth cloths
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best burp cloths I’ve ever used, and I’ve tried all kinds! They’re extremely soft, and the softness does not wear off after washing! These burp cloths are the perfect size—larger than most. They are also very absorbent. They’re worth the money. I’ve purchased 3 packs.
customer_reviews.author: Covertclown

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I bought more and use them all the time. Super easy to wash and i like how soft they are. I place it under my daughter chin while she drinks her bottle to catch any spillage and she loves to cuddle with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nifty Nel

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy - No savings here
customer_reviews.text: Special offer for Amazon Prime customers. I thought I was saving $5. I didn't realize the order would be for 2 sets. $40 for for the thinnest burp cloths I ever saw. And I bought as a shower gift! I could have gotten something a lot nicer for $40. -- I can't believe people pay $25 for these.
customer_reviews.author: JeanieQ

customer_reviews.title: Silky Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: My darling 3.5 month grand daughter is already teething! I needed something for the saliva and wanted the best cotton! I got exactly what I was looking for! The silky softness is perfect! for her delicate face and skin!!
customer_reviews.author: Miss. J

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and gender neutral
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a baby shower off a baby registry. They are very cute and very gender neutral. The material is pretty thin, but for a burp cloth they seem like they will work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Burrier

customer_reviews.title: Thick, soft, & downright amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Toss alllll your other burp rags and buy these suckers. These are the only ones I use! They look so much nicer than most and are super thick so the spitup soaks up and stays on the burp rag and not your shoulder. Not to mention they are insanely soft and last through a few feedings!
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: All around perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful. I'm always a little sad when these are in the laundry and I need to use a different brand. They are a nice medium thickness and very soft. The patterns and colors are attractive and neutral. The stitching is sound. I wish I knew how good this brand was before my baby shower as I would have asked for more Burt's Bee cloth items.
customer_reviews.author: Book Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Soft burp cloths
customer_reviews.text: These are so soft! I wish I found these for my first child, and got rid of all other burp cloths. The only suggestion I would have, is to make a bigger size. I would buy a larger set in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: sunnysidesteph

customer_reviews.title: the BEST burp clothes!!
customer_reviews.text: THE best burp clothes!! My son was a happy spitter, meaning he basically soaked multiple burp clothes a day. We tried many different burp clothes and these are by far the best! Great size, absorbency, and quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best burp cloth!
customer_reviews.text: All time favorite burp cloths! I have a spitter and I feel like the Burt’s burp cloths are the best. Absorb nicely. Easy to wash and fold, they are very organized in the drawer! A must for any new mama!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Soft and effective
customer_reviews.text: Super soft burp cloths, and they absorb fantastic. My baby spits up all the time so these were a must and they're doing the job great. They're aren't super thick though, so once a spit up occurs they're pretty much ready for the wash.
customer_reviews.author: TRW07

customer_reviews.title: Softness, absorbency, and size worth ever penny
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best burp rags. They are super soft, absorbent, and large. They are pricey, but they are worth every penny. After being washed dozens of times, they maintain their quality and softness.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great durable burp cloths!
customer_reviews.text: These are lovely soft cotton burp cloths. They have held up super well in the wash and still look so great after months of use. They are nice and thick so you don't have to worry about seepage to the other side, yet light weight enough for they are packable.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette S.

customer_reviews.title: Loose their shape.
customer_reviews.text: Ok I am a bit OCD with keeping things nice and folded and on their original shape , I got this to replace mi gerber ones because had a funky smell but this burts bees ones didn't do the trick because they loose their shape and too thin , mi baby keep spitting milk all the time and they just got soak each time and when he started drooling the same , also they loose their shape!!
customer_reviews.author: Yadira

customer_reviews.title: Low profile, moderately absorbent
customer_reviews.text: These are totally acceptable burp cloths. They aren’t as absorbent as muslin options but they’re also lower profile for stuffing into your diaper bag, pocket, bra strap, whatever it takes. They’re also a bit cheaper than the nicer muslin options.
customer_reviews.author: Ciarra LusterTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: Burt's bees products are great!! Got these for my newborn and they are such a life saver when it comes to burping and catching any spit up from my baby. Everything comes right off when i wash it and keeps it soft touch every time.
customer_reviews.author: Tisha

customer_reviews.title: Great for a preemie
customer_reviews.text: Our favorite burp cloths. We have a very small preemie. The thicker burp cloths are just not practical right now. These are very soft, fit well, and are very absorbent. Stand up to washing and stains come out with Shout free.
customer_reviews.author: Verde

customer_reviews.title: One of my faves!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite baby products. The cloth is quality and super soft. This brand has excellent baby supplies. I would order 2 packs and you will be set for your infant. They can later be used for toddlers as well. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Noah Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Remove the stickers before washing!
customer_reviews.text: These burp cloths are great. They're soft and absorbent, but they came packaged together and I thought I removed all the labels, plastic, etc. before I washed them. I didn't. Each one had a round Burt's Bees sticker on it and if you don't know what happens when you wash and dry stickers on fabric, you don't want to know! A sticker on each one seems like overkill. Otherwise, love these!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!
customer_reviews.text: These burp cloths are the best ever. I ordered more after about a month. They're soft and just all around handy. We were given other styles/brands as shower gifts and have only used them when these were in the wash
customer_reviews.author: Antatia Post

customer_reviews.title: Lovely soft burp cloths!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Love these burp cloths - got the pink and blue ones and it's perfect nr. Wish they had more color variety than just the pink - blue- grey standard (boring). They absorb nicely and wash easily. No stains so far after standard wash and dry. Have washed them in hot temp and haven't shrank - kudos!
customer_reviews.author: Vishal Kapoor

customer_reviews.title: Would make a great gift
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I expected, but I honestly didn’t read dimensions in the description. Very soft. I wish they were a little thicker but are thick enough for most spit ups.
customer_reviews.author: sugarsquare

customer_reviews.title: The only burp cloth I’ll use
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th order of these, simply to allow less loads of daily laundry and a set for my daughters daycare. These are my favorite burp cloth. Super soft, absorbent, and durable. Plus is the organic cotton!
customer_reviews.author: Christie L. Wentz

customer_reviews.title: Not absorbent, but VERY soft
customer_reviews.text: Very very soft and normally a huge fan of Burts Bees. But these burp cloths are not absorbent, the breast milk runs right off it. It’s good for wiping off spit up but needs the extra pressure/abrasion to soak up the liquid. I love how soft they are tho so I use them for other things.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia D

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite burp cloths
customer_reviews.text: Our favorite burp cloths. We don't leave the house without them. They are so soft and comfy. They soak our little guys spit up without a problem. The only issue with having white burp clothes is that they are getting a little yellow with so many washes. Nothing a little bit of bleach won't get rid of. Will definitely have to order some more!!
customer_reviews.author: Cttech92

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Burp Cloths
customer_reviews.text: These burp cloths are super soft and thin so that they are easy to slide under my babies chunky little chin, they absorb easy and if used to wipe babies are super soft! They clean very well and do not stain easily. This will be my third order of these.
customer_reviews.author: misty poole

customer_reviews.title: Favorite burp cloths
customer_reviews.text: I really like these burp cloths. They are my favorite amongst all my different burp clothes. Perfect size, absorbent, and super soft.
customer_reviews.author: IloveVegetablesDawg

customer_reviews.title: Love them so much I keep buying more since I hate being without them.
customer_reviews.text: These burp cloths are the BEST! So soft and the perfect size that you don't immediately need another one after small burps and spit ups.
